input_data.title: Instinct
input_data.overview: Dr. Dylan Reinhart, a gifted author, university professor and former CIA operative is lured back to his old life by tenacious top NYPD Detective Lizzie Needham. Though Dylan and Lizzie initially clash, when it comes to catching killers, they make an ideal team.

response.analytical_summary: Instinct is a crime drama series that blends procedural elements with a unique premise: a celebrated author with a background in covert operations is drawn back into the world of criminal investigation. The series explores the dynamic between the protagonist, a man grappling with his past and a driven detective, as they navigate complex cases and confront personal demons. The show aims to deliver suspenseful mysteries interwoven with character-driven narratives, examining themes of morality, redemption, and the blurred lines between civilian and operative life. While maintaining a procedural structure, the series attempts to offer a deeper exploration of the psychological toll of violence and the challenges of reintegration.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Dr. Dylan Reinhart, a renowned author and former CIA operative, living a quiet life as a university professor. His peaceful existence is disrupted when NYPD Detective Lizzie Needham seeks his help in solving a series of murders that mirror the plots of his own novels. Initially reluctant, Dylan is drawn into the investigation, utilizing his unique understanding of criminal psychology and operational tactics. As Dylan and Lizzie work together, they uncover a network of interconnected cases, revealing a larger conspiracy that threatens to expose secrets from Dylan's past. Throughout the series, Dylan confronts his former colleagues and enemies, grappling with the consequences of his past actions and the moral compromises he made during his time in the CIA. The partnership between Dylan and Lizzie evolves, marked by initial friction and eventually a grudging respect and reliance on one another. The overarching narrative involves Dylan’s attempts to reconcile his past life with his present, while simultaneously assisting Lizzie in bringing dangerous criminals to justice, often uncovering deeper layers of corruption within the city’s institutions.
response.keyword_sentence: Instinct is a suspenseful crime drama set in modern-day New York City, following a haunted protagonist and a driven detective as they confront graphic violence and unravel complex cases rooted in past trauma and corruption.
